channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Van parked for several days blocking pavement, 18th October
item.description:
Van parked for several days blocking the pavement and forcing pedestrians into the road. Very dangerous to blind or sight impaired

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Merrilees Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Installation of camera inside property, 18th October
item.description:
Resident of 39 Fawcett has had an camera installed inside the block of flats 34'43 of the Estate. The camera is solely facing my front alone door at 38. My family feel monitored and very uncomfortable with its position and want an investigated and its remo

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Common, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Powdered substance dumped under tree, 18th October
item.description:
Someone has dumped quite a big quantity of white powder under a tree and on the grass verge near the junction of Kings Hall Rd and Lennard Rd. Could be some kind of building material? Now being spread around the road by animals.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Other category requirements of full trading standards review, 18th October
item.description:
Team A long way from EC1V 2NX People seem to be targeted unethical by companies in your area It's out of control and needs full trading standards review Example a car registration your area has - should absolutely not have the data Locally Pre and post spso ico Make sure you have taken all other courses of action to raise your issue, or to get your problem solved. For example, contact the relevant central Government department, and relevant officers at your local councils. So as its unresolved Request you stop your area churning out letters to vulnerable people who find your type of contact unwanted conduct

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 152-160, City Road, Finsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kids stealing E bikes and robbing cyclers, 18th October
item.description:
For the last few months a group of kids (up to 20 kids sometimes) have been using the Lime bike parking area where the cycle path narrows, to have parties, harass people, rob Deliveroo drivers of their bikes and assault them, firing fireworks at cyclers.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stamford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Guardrail severely damaged, 18th October
item.description:
I reported this previously and it was closed stating ‘dos not meet guidelines’ or ‘already repaired’ this has not been repaired and I do not underhand why this does not meet the guidelines for being repaired. It’s is mangled and damaged following a vehicle strike. There is sharp metal sticking out which should another vehicle hit it will cause severe damage

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
